page.title: 08HOME LIFE.6.
page.content: A Day in the Life of Michael Aston. I wake up at 6.45a.m.and get dressed.I have my cereal and watch Popeye at 7.25a.m..As time flies I get ready for school.Then at 8.15a.m. I go and call for Robert then we go to school.We arrive and have some time to play.Then we go inside and have register and read for 5 minutes.We have 3 lessons and then we have a 20 minute break.After two more lessons it' dinner time which is at 12 o'clock.I have a 2 course meal normally.After dinner we have a bit of playtime,register then four more lessons.We put our chairs up and go home. When I arrive home I feed my dog and get into my play clothes.Then I watch T.V. or play.My mom comes home from work and makes tea for us then I go to bed.
